In [[December]] [[2005]], [[Italy|Italian]] [[scientists]] at [[Pavia University]] found that a [[molecule]] known as the [[Nerve Growth Factor]] has high levels when people first fall in love, but these levels return to as they were after one year.
 
In [[December]] [[2005]], [[Italy|Italian]] [[scientists]] at [[Pavia University]] found that a [[molecule]] known as the [[Nerve Growth Factor]] has high levels when people first fall in love, but these levels return to as they were after one year.
    −
"NGF level was significantly higher (p<0.001) in the subjects in love [mean (SEM): 227 (14) pg/ml] than in either the subjects with a long-lasting relationship [123 (10) pg/ml] or the subjects with no relationship [149 (12) pg/ml]. Notably, there was also a significant positive correlation between levels of NGF and the intensity of romantic love as assessed with the passionate love scale (r=0.34; p=0.007). No differences in the concentrations of other NTs were detected. In 39 subjects in love who—after 12–24 months—maintained the same relationship but were no longer in the same mental state to which they had referred during the initial evaluation, plasma NGF levels decreased and became indistinguishable from those of the control groups."[http://www.healthnewsblog.com]
+
"NGF level was significantly higher (p<0.001) in the subjects in love [mean (SEM): 227 (14) pg/ml] than in either the subjects with a long-lasting relationship [123 (10) pg/ml] or the subjects with no relationship [149 (12) pg/ml]. Notably, there was also a significant positive correlation between levels of NGF and the intensity of romantic love as assessed with the passionate love scale (r=0.34; p=0.007). No differences in the concentrations of other NTs were detected. In 39 subjects in love who-after 12-24 months-maintained the same relationship but were no longer in the same mental state to which they had referred during the initial evaluation, plasma NGF levels decreased and became indistinguishable from those of the control groups."[http://www.healthnewsblog.com]
